title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 140.4 - Reinsurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 140.4 - Reinsurance

State Regulations

Calls for experience will relate to experience for direct business only. Therefore, the reports of experience shall not include premiums received from or losses paid to other carriers on account of reinsurance assumed by the reporting carrier nor shall any deductions be made by the reporting carrier for premiums ceded to or for losses recovered from other carriers on account of reinsurance ceded. Notes

140.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
